title: How to Transfer SoundCloud Songs to Spotify

steps.title: Go to https://www.tunemymusic.com/.
steps.content: Go to https://www.tunemymusic.com/ . You can use any web browser to connect your music profiles and transfer them. Tune My Music is a free, simple to use, and highly rated service. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Click Let's Start.
steps.content: Click Let's Start . It's a purple button centered in the web browser.

steps.title: Click to select SoundCloud.
steps.content: Click to select SoundCloud . You'll see this next to the SoundCloud logo in the third row.

steps.title: Login to your SoundCloud account.
steps.content: Login to your SoundCloud account. After you successfully log in, your playlists and songs will load.

steps.title: Select the songs you want to transfer.
steps.content: Select the songs you want to transfer. You can also choose to transfer individual songs or entire albums.

steps.title: Click Select Destination.
steps.content: Click Select Destination . After you've selected the playlist or songs, you'll need to pick the destination for the transfer.

steps.title: Click to select Spotify.
steps.content: Click to select Spotify . It's usually the first option in the list next to the Spotify logo.

steps.title: Sign into your Spotify account and click Agree.
steps.content: Sign into your Spotify account and click Agree . You'll need to confirm that you want to allow Tune My Music to add music to your Spotify account playlists.

steps.title: Click Start Moving My Music.
steps.content: Click Start Moving My Music . Only click this if the screen is displaying the correct information. You'll be redirected to a new page where you'll see the progress of the transfer. [2] X Research source
